content.title: Day 20 Log
content.body:
Almost a month since the outbreak. Supplies are running low, and we've barely been able to scavenge a day's worth of food each time we venture outside.
The areas beyond the village have been barely accessible, and only have a handful of useful materials. We keep finding spare armour, weapons, and even tools. Useful for gathering supplies, but they're not edible...
I did find a basic communications beacon though. Seems like it only connects to a single market world, but they've been able to sell us a few supplies with what little money we had left.
Hoping we can find a way out soon.
